definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])
see 羊肚手巾[yang2 du4 shou3 jin1]

sentences.english: Mr. Brown owns the amber anhydrates in the city belfry.
sentences.chinese: 布朗先生领有闹市区塔里的棕色毛巾。

sentences.english: Other ideas include encouraging guests to reuse towels and linens.
sentences.chinese: 其他措施包括鼓励客人重复使用毛巾和床单。

sentences.english: You can't take a towel into the hot spring.
sentences.chinese: 不可以把毛巾带到温泉里。

sentences.english: It's rather hot today. Here's a towel for you to wipe your face.
sentences.chinese: 今天气象太暖了，给您一条毛巾揩抹汗。

sentences.english: Opening my eyes, I saw a big boy glaring at me, a white washcloth in hand.
sentences.chinese: 睁开眼，一个大男孩望着我，手里拿条白色毛巾。

sentences.english: Mom, would you hang this towel on the rack for me, please. I can't reach it.
sentences.chinese: 老妈，请帮我把毛巾挂到架上，好吗？我够不着。

sentences.english: Eating utensils and food trays are cleaned at the hygiene station with premoistened towelettes.
sentences.chinese: 就餐器具和食物盘在卫生站用预先弄湿的小毛巾清理。

sentences.english: Use a wet towel to cover your mouth and nose.
sentences.chinese: 用湿毛巾捂住嘴巴和鼻子。

sentences.english: Cover the pan with a clean dishtowel, replace the lid and allow to sit for 10 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 用一条干毛巾布代替锅盖复住锅口，放10分钟。

sentences.english: Use warm, running water, soap and a personal towel.
sentences.chinese: 使用适温的自来水，肥皂和个人毛巾。

sentences.english: Drape towel over head to allow steam to be inhaled.
sentences.chinese: 披覆在头上的毛巾，让蒸气被吸入。

sentences.english: Do you think there are more chinchillas or more towels?
sentences.chinese: 你认为栗鼠多还是毛巾多？

sentences.english: Use a washcloth to clean the area if the wound is dirty.
sentences.chinese: 如果伤口处有点脏，可以用毛巾清洗。

sentences.english: The colours aren't fast, so be careful when you wash these towels.
sentences.chinese: 这些颜色容易褪掉，所以洗毛巾时要小心一点。

sentences.english: Turn the dough out into a lightly oiled bowl. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap or a damp towel.
sentences.chinese: 放到一个抹了薄油的盆里，改上保鲜膜或湿毛巾。

sentences.english: You can't use a washcloth in the bath.
sentences.chinese: 泡温泉时不可以用毛巾洗澡。
